title: Stassi Schroeder sits front row at Nicole Miller NYFW show
text: She teamed the suggestive number with a pair of strappy nude stilettos. The blonde beauty styled her locks stick straight and kept the accessories to a minimum. Reality stars unite: Stassi mingled with Real Housewives Of New York City star Dorinda Medley ahead of the show VIP: Stassi was spotted on the front row along with reality TV star Dorothy Wang from Rich Kids Of Beverly Hills, Nats Getty and Youtuber Gigi Gorgeous The fashionable star added a pop of color to her look with a bold red glossy lip. Stassi mingled with Real Housewives Of New York City star Dorinda Medley ahead of the show. Later, Stassi was spotted on the front row along with reality TV star Dorothy Wang from Rich Kids Of Beverly Hills, Nats Getty and Youtuber Gigi Gorgeous. All smiles! Newlyweds Luann de Lesseps and Tom D'Agostino Jr. also attended the Nicole Miller collection runway show Such a tease! Luann, 51, flashed slivers of flesh in a skintight black dress which featured cut-outs. The sexy sheer panels showed off the mother-of-two's toned tummy and trim thighs Newlyweds Luann de Lesseps and Tom D'Agostino Jr. also attended the Nicole Miller collection runway show. Luann, 51, flashed slivers of flesh in a skintight black dress which featured cut-outs. The sexy sheer panels showed off the mother-of-two's toned tummy and trim thighs. She finished off her look with a large silver statement necklace and black pointy-toed heels. Matchy-matchy: Victoria's Secret PINK model Rachel Hilbert (left) and songstress Sarah Barthel (right) donned similar plunging black jumpsuits More black! Emeraude Toubia also opted for a black ensemble. The actress wore a strapless peplum top and cropped flared trousers and accessorized with a matching choker Victoria's Secret PINK model Rachel Hilbert and songstress Sarah Barthel donned similar looks. Both beauties took the plunge in a daring black silk jumpsuit for the fashion event. Emeraude Toubia also chose black, and opted for a strapless peplum top and cropped flared trousers. The 27-year-old actress pulled her long raven locks back into a low ponytail and accessorized with a black double-wrap choker. Rock hard: Former Bachelorette Andi Dorfman showed off her flat abs in a crop top and matching black pants. She topped the look off with a long fur coat Taking the plunge: Eden Sassoon chose a sexy pantsuit with a plunging lace jacket Metallic lady: Louisa Warwick made a leggy display in a black and gold long-sleeved mini dress Former Bachelorette Andi Dorfman was also in attendance. The 29-year-old Georgia native showed off her flat abs in a crop top and matching black pants. She topped the look off with a beautiful knee-length dark fur coat and nude pointy-toed heels. The brunette beauty styled her lengthy ombre tresses stick straight with a middle part and wore heavy eye makeup and a clear gloss on her lips. See-through look: Miss Universe 2016 Iris Mittenaere chose a sheer white and black feminine frock She's still got it! Carol Alt took the plunge in a deep V-cut curve-hugging dress proving the 56-year-old model still looks fabulous Bold look: Gigi Gorgeous made a leggy display in a colorful mini-dress Details: The Youtuber teamed the look with nude suede thigh-thigh boots and kept warm with a bright pink fur coat Miss Universe 2016 Iris Mittenaere also chose a sheer white and black feminine frock. While Carol Alt took the plunge in a deep V-cut curve-hugging dress proving the 56-year-old model still has it going on. Gigi Gorgeous made a leggy display in a colorful mini-dress and teamed the look with nude suede thigh-thigh boots and kept warm with a bright pink fur coat. Nicole Miller flashed a large smile and a wave at the end of her show. The designer said: 'My #Fall2017 collection is an exploration of New York’s darker street edge. I wanted to move from St. Mark’s Place presented in Pre-Fall to dig deeper into the underground scene of the city...' The collection: 'It's an exploration of New York’s darker street edge,' Nicole Miller said Well pleased!
